title: Interpretation of a dream about wool fluff in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fine wool in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about fine wool in a dream, there are a large number of clues and interpretations of dreams and we find that in general scholars and workers search for interpretations, and the site managers have no involvement in the interpretations, rather they are senders of the scholars’ interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about wool fluff in a dream: Soft wool in a dream may indicate happy news coming to the dreamer in those days, thanks to God. Seeing soft wool in a dream may indicate some good deeds that the dreamer will do and the huge livelihood that he may gain. If one sees that The wool has become thin, so this may indicate the end of an illness or problem that the owner was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. Seeing fluffed wool in a dream could indicate the good changes that will happen to the dreamer in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Wearing a black leather jacket in a dream A black leather jacket in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams during this period, and God knows best. If a person sees himself wearing a black jacket, this may indicate the arrival of good news to the dreamer these days, and God knows best. If you see yourself wearing A black leather jacket in a dream, as this may indicate success at work or study, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing wearing a leather jacket in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life and during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting cloth in a dream: Cutting cloth In a dream, it may indicate happy events that will come to the dreamer these days, and God knows best. It is possible to see pieces of cloth in a dream indicating good changes that will occur to the vision during this period, thanks to God. Seeing pieces of cloth in a dream may indicate happy events that will happen to the dreamer during this Time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing a piece of cloth in a dream indicates the end of the worries and sorrows of the dreamer’s life at that time, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about goat skin in a dream: Goat skin in a dream can indicate perseverance and the desire to achieve desires and dreams. Seeing goat skin In a dream, it may mean that he is holding on to something strongly during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing goat skin in a dream indicates the presence of some elements and people that greatly influenced him during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about taking a jacket from someone in a dream: wearing A jacket from someone else in a dream can indicate good health, thanks to God. If she sees a jacket from another person in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in her life during this period, and God knows best. Seeing taking a jacket from another person in a dream may indicate The stability of the family and the family they enjoy a lot during this time. If you see a jacket from another person in a dream, this may indicate an improvement in the financial and social situation in those days, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about washing wool with someone in a dream Washing wool in a dream with another person may indicate To the blessing of money and the wide life that he enjoys

title: Interpretation of a dream about losing virginity, meaning of losing virginity in a dream

preview.html: We review for you the interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s peeling from a single woman, and the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s peeling. A vision of losing virginity according to Ibn Sirin. Breaking the hymen. Interpretation of virginity in a dream. Whoever sees her virginity broken, it is a hasty flogging and marriage is coming soon. As commentators said: Marrying a virgin, crying is joy, supplication is good, food and blessings, and I believe There is something very happy in your life. Whoever sees in a dream that she has lost her virginity, if she is not married to a virgin girl or a divorced woman or a widow, this indicates in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation that marriage is likely, and in another interpretation it indicates happiness and pleasure. The matter that will bring happiness and joy to her heart in the coming days or she will get a wish that she was patiently waiting for. It is also said in Ibn Sirin’s interpretations that it is complete happiness for her and for those around her from the family, which is goodness, happiness, happiness and command, and if that is by screaming and crying in a dream. Therefore, it is good and happiness. Others believe that seeing a virgin and unmarried woman losing her virginity is a transition in her life or her family to a new stage in the direction of good and better, or one of the unwanted things that she will receive in her life. As for whoever saw a married or pregnant woman and her virginity was restored Breaking her hymen, this indicates the renewal of the marital bond, affection and love with her husband, or the discovery of something she made a mistake in. Her husband, and it may indicate that the doors of livelihood will be opened for her and her husband. Because marriage brings blessings. And if a female sees that she is trying to break her virginity with her own hand and is looking for a tool or a place to hide from people or from the family, then she will suffer a misfortune to her honor or reveal a scandalous secret. For her, whether parents or people, and perhaps breaking one’s virginity indicates marriage, or a warning against adultery, as in the hadith of the Companions of the Cave... “And the other said: Oh my God, my cousin, whom I loved as a man, loved women. O servant of God, fear God and do not open the ring except with His right, so I stood up... If you know that I did that for the sake of your face, then make a gap for us, then release us... Agreed upon. The conclusion of this dream: It may indicate a change in many situations. There may be early marriage, but beware of prostitution and people forbidden to travel. Interpretation of peeling in a dream - YouTube

title: The correct interpretation of visiting a doctor in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a doctor in a dream? The doctor is one of the people whom God Almighty has chosen to be addressed in order to heal His servants, so what about seeing him in a dream? Seeing a doctor in a dream is a confusing vision. Seeing a sick person in reality can be interpreted as an imminent recovery and its meaning can be reflected in the right person and it can bring another sign that is not related to the disease, and this is what we will learn through today’s topic. Doctor in a dream. Interpretations of this vision vary according to the details and social status of the dreamer and also differ. Depending on his health condition, because the symbol of a doctor in a dream can be a source of safety and security, and it can be a source of anxiety and doubt. Visiting a doctor in a dream indicates that the dreamer will go to a mosque or school. Visiting a doctor in a dream leads to knowledge and understanding in religion, and it also provides medicine. To treat patients, so does knowledge and understanding. In religion, there is a cure for ignorance and the sought-after solace for the heart. Meeting a famous doctor expresses to the dreamer his need for some knowledge, so he commits to going to the mosque every prayer and praying to God Almighty to give him useful knowledge. Whoever sees that he went to the doctor in his dream, this has been interpreted according to He is looking for a friend to offer him a helping hand and help him with some matters. As for seeing him in a married woman’s dream, this was interpreted as the dreamer’s desire to do good and her serious efforts to get closer to God Almighty through charity and helping others. Seeing a doctor in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq and mentioned by Imam Al-Sadiq In his interpretation of this dream, it indicates the exposure of worries and the elimination of problems that the dreamer faces in his real life, and it may indicate that his circumstances have improved and changed for the better. However, if the person is suffering from financial hardship and has accumulated debts, then a visit to the doctor could be a sign of God’s success in paying him off. His debts and getting rid of the worries that he suffered as a result. If a person is actually sick, seeing this is a sign that he will recover soon. Seeing a doctor in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The doctor in the eyes of Ibn Sirin is a symbol of knowledge and understanding in religion, and whoever seeks a doctor should seek refuge in God and seek knowledge. If he sees a doctor in a dream selling some coffins, this is evidence of his betrayal of the profession’s regulations and that he is one of the fraudsters who do not prescribe appropriate treatment for patients, so he should beware of him. The young man who goes to the doctor is actually looking for solutions to the problems he is exposed to, and the doctor who enters the person’s home, as long as his appearance does not show any harm, is evidence of the person’s good condition. Seeing a person in a dream killing a doctor is clear evidence from Ibn Sirin’s point of view that he is backward in worship and many sins and misdeeds committed by the dreamer, God forbid. Seeing a doctor in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a doctor in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about a doctor who sees an unmarried woman for him. ​​Several connotations that we will learn about by presenting some important points that were included in the words of the interpreters. If she saw in her dream that a doctor had proposed marriage to her,

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white dove flying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about white doves flying: Seeing a white dove flying inside the house indicates the happiness that all family members will enjoy. Dreaming about a white dove indicates safety, security, freedom, and abundant living, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If one sees a white dove, it will be slaughtered. This dream in a dream indicates many disputes and problems. Seeing a white dove hunting in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will achieve great success. Interpretation of seeing a black dove for a single woman. Seeing a black dove for an unmarried girl in a dream means that she will face many problems and crises. An unmarried girl’s interest in the black dove in her home indicates that she is committing sins. And you need to get closer to God. The only person who got rid of the dove indicates a grudge against him and an attempt to spoil his reputation among people. If the dove stood in front of the girl’s room, this dream indicates that she will face many consequences and difficulties. Seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married / married woman. The dove in a dream, this dream It indicates marital happiness, bringing money and offspring. Seeing a black dove in a dream symbolizes many problems and disagreements between spouses. If a married woman sees that she is taking a bath in a dream, this means that she will soon become pregnant by God’s command. If she sees a black dove in a dream for a married woman, this It means that you will soon hear unpleasant news, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a white dove flying for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a white dove flying in a dream, it means good health for her and her child. Seeing a large dove in a dream symbolizes that the pregnant woman will give birth to a boy, God willing. If the dove is small in size in The dream means that the pregnant woman will give birth to a female, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman eating a pigeon in a dream, and its taste was delicious, indicates the arrival of kindness, livelihood, and abundant money. Interpretation of a dream about a slaughtered pigeon in a dream If one sees a slaughtered pigeon in a dream, then this dream indicates that the dreamer He will achieve what he wants by God’s command. A dream of a slaughtered pigeon, found in a far away place, indicates many crises that the dreamer will face. An unmarried man slaughtering a pigeon in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get married soon, God willing. If a man sees that he slaughters a pigeon in a dream, this sign indicates Indicates that he will face many consequences and conflicts. Interpretation of a dream of a small pigeon in a dream: If anyone sees a small pigeon, this in the dream indicates the happiness that the person will enjoy. Seeing a pigeon flying in a dream means that the dreamer will travel soon, God willing. If one carries a small pigeon in In a dream, this indicates the abundance of money that he will obtain. If the dreamer sees a small dove in his hand in a dream, this means that he will soon obtain a prestigious position. Interpretation of seeing Zaghloul’s pigeons in a dream If one sees a dove in a dream, then this dream shows the love of that person among People. Seeing a white dove in a dream symbolizes bringing money to the dreamer. A Zaghloul pigeon in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes achieving success and distinction by the command of God. If he sees

title: Interpretation of seeing grandparents in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing grandparents in a dream is one of the visions that many consider promising and they are looking for an interpretation of it through famous dream interpretations such as Ibn Sirin, and our website will provide a set of interpretations of some scenes of visions of grandfather and grandmother in a dream from interpretation books, but we always emphasize through a transparent and reliable website that these interpretations should not be inferred for any other vision even if there is a match between them and the interpreted vision, because the world of dream interpretation does not depend only on interpreting the details of the vision, but rather depends on many other factors, such as certain circumstances of the dreamer, which the interpreter must know well in order to be able to interpret them. Read also: Piano in a dream Interpretation of seeing grandparents in a dream Interpretation of seeing grandparents in a dream The interpretation of seeing the grandfather and grandmother in the interpretation differs according to the details of the vision that the dreamer saw When you see the grandfather in a dream, this is an indication that the dreamer is always thinking about the past. There are also some interpreters who interpret seeing the grandfather in a dream as an indication of the dreamer's ability to achieve the aspirations and dreams he seeks. And since the grandfather was smiling in the dream, some interpreters consider this an indication that the dreamer is one of the characters Obedient to God, and those close to Him, and those who try to preserve it. Read also: A feast in a dream Seeing the grandfather in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of seeing the grandfather and grandmother in a dream for a single girl, especially when she sees the grandfather, this indicates the abundance of sustenance, blessing and kindness that the girl will enjoy. However, if the vision of the grandfather appears in a frightening image for the girl, this indicates the anxiety, fear and despair that the girl suffers from. As for the girl who sees that he is praying behind her grandfather, this expresses the reassurance and comfort that this girl feels. Read also: Seeing pins in a dream Seeing my grandmother in a dream The interpretation of seeing the grandfather and grandmother in a dream does not differ greatly between seeing the grandfather or seeing the grandmother, but when you see a grandmother in a dream, it does not differ whether the dreamer is a woman or a man, as the grandmother in a dream always expresses ambition and striving to achieve goals. Also, the grandmother in a dream can express the abundance of nutrition and worldly pleasures that the dreamer is looking for. Seeing deceased grandparents in a dream The interpretation of seeing deceased grandparents in a dream has two interpretations, one of which is not good and symbolizes that the dreamer will not live for a long time. And there is an interpretation Another for the deceased grandfather and grandmother in a dream. If the grandparents look fine, this expresses the person’s anxiety and pessimism about the future. Read also: Backgrounds in a dream Seeing the grandfather in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees her grandparents in a dream, this indicates money, a lot of livelihood and kindness that the woman will receive, God knows best. As for the married woman who sees her grandfather in bed, this is good news for the offspring. Also, seeing a married woman talking to one of her grandparents indicates the married woman’s ability to achieve her desires and dreams. title: Interpretation of a dream about bathing in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing a shower in a dream: Seeing a shower in a dream is considered a praiseworthy dream that indicates goodness and justice for the dreamer. You may also be interested in meeting a horse in a dream, as the leading dream interpreters have interpreted the bathroom in a dream in many interpretations for a man, a married woman, and a single girl, but the matter varies depending on the situation. The fortuneteller, as we will tell you in this article. The meaning of seeing a shower in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing a shower in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of a shower with several interpretations, as follows: A dream of a shower in front of people indicates the abundance of goodness that the dreamer will attain. A dream of a dreamer who takes a shower in front of people indicates People he knows indicate that his kindness will increase. Seeing the dreamer bathing while naked in front of people indicates the dreamer’s bad reputation. The fortuneteller’s dream shows that he is bathing and is happy in his sleep, and this indicates that he has good morals. Dreaming of bathing a sick person in a dream indicates that he will recover soon. From an illness that he suffered a lot from. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing bathing in a dream for a single woman. The dream of bathing in a girl’s dream is considered one of the most promising dreams for her, as follows: Dreaming of bathing for an unmarried woman indicates a good condition and her distance from sins, as it shows purity Her heart. Dreaming of a girl bathing in her clothes indicates that marriage is approaching for her. Dreaming of a girl bathing in a dream without clothes, but no one saw her, indicates happiness and joy for her soon. A dream of a girl shows that she is bathing and has problems, and this indicates that these problems will be eliminated In fact. Seeing a girl bathing with soap and water and feeling happy indicates that she is fulfilling her duties and making her closer to God. title: Seeing paper money in a dream

preview.html: Seeing paper money in a dreamDream interpretation scholars are divided over the meaning of seeing banknotes in a dream and the many indications associated with it about the interpretation of the dream of banknotes from its various aspects. Seeing banknotes in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing paper money in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream is based on many considerations that the interpretation specialist must be informed of in order to reach the most accurate meaning of the dream, because some say that it is a sign of goodness, while others oppose the opinion and explain it. It is a sign of sadness and sadness. Some interpretation experts tend to consider it a confirmation of the blessing of children and the increase in their number, in addition to the good reputation that the dreamer enjoys in reality. Others indicate that it is a sign of success in work, and collecting a lot of money from it, and if someone is absent and returns after seeing banknotes, God may give a great opportunity for a person to go to him. Pilgrimage if he sees it in his dream. If you see that you are keeping a lot of paper money in your home, it is likely that someone has given you confidence but you refuse to return it to him again. And if you see yourself getting rid of the money you have and throwing it out the window outside your home, it is likely that you are entering a quiet phase of life and that annoying and heavy things are far from you. There are some things that do not bode well in a dream about paper money, and if one loses a piece of paper, it may be said that one of his children may be involved in an accident or die, God forbid, and a person must be careful about this matter. By seeing the burning of these coins, a person incurs a huge loss in his work or the trade he owns, and his exposure may reach the level of theft, so he must save his money from loss as much as he can. Seeing banknotes in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin enters into the issue of the difference in the meaning of the dream of the banknote on the idea in which it appeared. And if the notes were handed over by the fiancé to his fiancée, it can be said that the marriage is near, and if the girl is engaged to someone and sees this dream, it is most likely that this is her official engagement and God knows best. Some experts point out that the idea of ​​distributing paper money emphasizes spending money on some trivial things that are useless and that a person can only brag about. The previous vision may mean that the person will enter happy days full of happy events and circumstances that give his life a different meaning and color after a difficult period. And if the deceased gives you banknotes, Ibn Sirin says: If he is a member of your family, it means that you will bear responsibility in that person's place and be a mortgage to that family. The previous dream may be related to the meaning of moving away from worship and worship and committing some sins that anger God from the dreamer, so this dream is a warning to return to God again. It is expected that finding it is not a pleasant thing, but if you find a large treasure, this indicates that you will collect a fortune that will change the shape of the coming life. title: Interpretation of Surat Taha in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of Surat Taha in a dream It has many symbols and associations that vary depending on the social status that the person who has the vision lives in, whether he is married or not, and through our distinguished and beloved website today we will learn all the details about it and follow us and stay with us for more details. Interpretation of Surat Taha in a dream Seeing Surat Taha in a dream means nullifying magic and the ability to overcome any suffering. Seeing the recitation of Surah Taha in His Highness’s dream proves that he asks for forgiveness, prays a lot, lives contentedly in every situation and enjoys this life. Many scholars and translators who are interested in interpreting visions and dreams have interpreted seeing Surah Taha in The dreamer's dream is an expression of returning to the true religion after deviating from it. Seeing Surat Taha in a dream foretells the dreamer that he will receive a good reward and a good ending. Seeing Surat Taha on the dreamer confirms that he is immune from the problems that he may face in his life. Seeing its recitation Surah Taha in the dreamer’s vision indicates avoiding committing sins, disobedience, and sins, guidance from God Almighty, a lot of goodness, and performing prayers at its proper time. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted Surah Taha in the dreamer’s dream as a sign of wealth and obtaining a more abundant and lawful livelihood. Confirmed Ibn Sirin said that whoever sees Surat Taha in a dream always does good deeds and good deeds. Seeing Surah Taha recited in the dreamer’s vision expresses the enjoyment of goodness, psychological comfort, happiness and psychological peace. Seeing Surat Taha recited in the dreamer’s vision symbolizes the removal of all obstacles or obstacles that were Previously preventing him from achieving progress in his life. Seeing people reciting Surat Taha for the dreamer in the vision portends God’s protection and immunity from God Almighty, and he will be able to solve all the problems that plague his life. Interpretation of Surat Taha in an unmarried girl’s dreamReading Surat Taha in a girl’s dream An unmarried woman confirms that her life will be full of happiness, comfort, and psychological stability. Seeing the recitation of Surat Taha in an unmarried girl’s dream foretells the death of all the problems, sorrows, and worries that she suffered in the past. Seeing the recitation of Surat Taha in an unmarried girl’s dream proves that she has hypocritical friends who appear There is before her what they do not express in their hearts towards her, but they will soon get rid of them, God willing. Seeing the recitation of Surat Taha in an unmarried girl’s dream means the approaching date of her marriage, engagement, or intercourse with a righteous, humble, and pious man who fears God Almighty before anything else. Reciting Surat Taha in an unmarried girl’s dream expresses her ability to preserve the honor and reputation of her future husband and that she deserves to be an ideal mother. Seeing Surat Taha recited in an unmarried girl’s dream is clear evidence of her ability to follow the teachings of God Almighty and comply with what He has commanded and forbidden. Interpretation Surah Taha in a man’s dream. Reciting Surah Taha to the dreamer in the vision confirms the many benefits that he will obtain and a speedy recovery from any sarcasm or touching that may harm him soon, God willing. Seeing Surah Taha being recited to the dreamer in the vision may express

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an office in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an officeInterpretation of a dream about seeing an office in a dream in detail, an office is a room or space where people work at home, or in an institution or company, and there is no institution without a set of offices, the office initially refers to the person who performs his job duties, so people sit at desks in their working life and this is normal. Interpretation of a dream about a position by Ibn Sirin Seeing an office in a dream shows intelligence, mind, spirit and emotion because it shows the dreamer's good and evil thoughts and correct decisions about the future in real life. Seeing a clean and tidy office in a dream means that it indicates success, stability and success in achieving the goals that the dreamer seeks in reality. Interpretation of dreams to see an unorganized and dirty office, because it indicates instability, whether in the psychological or material situation, and the bad and negative thoughts of the person who dreams, and the inability to make correct decisions about the future. Seeing an office room in a dream is a testament to the intelligence and cunning of that dreamer. Seeing the purchase of a new office room in a dream means that the situation has changed for the better. Interpretation of a dream about an individual office Seeing a single girl in the office in a dream means that she achieves her desires and goals in life. Seeing single people hosting a stranger in the office indicates the establishment of new relationships, whether in life Professional or personal, and it may be on an emotional level. Seeing a clean office in a girl's dream is organized, elegant and clean for a single woman, because it shows the stability of her situation and that she is in a state of balance. Seeing unmarried people in a dream that they are sitting in an office and running a company, factory or company, this symbolizes that something important will happen in her life, whether in the short or long term. Seeing a single girl sitting at a desk in a dream is a sign of ambition and perseverance, and that she has a mind and a notebook and wants to pursue the goals and desires that she hopes to achieve in life. Interpretation of a dream about an office for a married woman Seeing a spacious, organized and luxurious office for a married woman means a happy event for her on a professional level. Having a home office in a married woman's dream symbolizes prosperity, well-being, material and social level and prestige. Seeing a married woman that a beautiful, handsome and generous stranger is sitting in the office, because it indicates the good fortune of a married woman. The interpretation of a dream about seeing an office full of books in a married woman's dream indicates integrity of thought, logic and sobriety. Interpretation of a dream about an office for a pregnant woman Seeing an office in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of safety Stability, security and safety from all harm. Seeing a quiet, elegant and tidy office in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the safety of her pregnancy and the safety of all evil, as the office is always away from noise and contains valuable things. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an office for a man Seeing an office for a man indicates the dominance of the mind, balance and intelligence, and seeing a man buying a new office indicates a change in his situation for the better. A man’s vision of an office and

title: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream: One of the strange things is the appearance of food in a dream, especially vegetables, including tomatoes. Many people wonder what it means to see tomatoes in a dream and whether it is dangerous or not. In this article, we will review the interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream, follow us. The meaning of seeing tomatoes in a dreamFor a single woman: If a single woman sees tomatoes in her dream, this means that she will soon have a person with good morals who will love her sincerely and, God willing, will marry her. For a married woman: When a married woman sees tomatoes in her dream, this is a sign that her family life will improve soon, God willing, and if there are any problems, they will go away, God willing. For a pregnant woman: Tomatoes in a pregnant woman’s dream are a sign that her birth will be easy and there will be no problems, and God knows best. For a man: If the man is single, tomatoes indicate an improvement in the financial situation of this young man and he enjoys a happy life. If he is married and sees tomatoes on his nipple in large quantities, this indicates an improvement in his relationship with his wife and children and spending more time with them. Interpretation of buying tomatoes in a dream for a single woman : If an unmarried woman sees herself buying tomatoes, it means that she will receive some good and good news in the near future. For a married woman: When a married woman sees herself buying tomatoes from the market, it means that her husband will get a lot of money from work and your financial conditions will improve God willing. For a pregnant woman: Tomatoes in general in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate the approaching date of her birth, but it will pass easily and conveniently, God willing. For a man: If the man is single, this means that he will soon marry a girl with good character and love. But if he For a married man, buying tomatoes in a dream means that his financial conditions will improve in the coming period, for him and his family. Interpretation of a dream about eating delicious tomatoes in a dream. For an unmarried woman: When an unmarried woman sees that she is eating tomatoes and they are delicious, this means that she will get rid of all her life’s problems and enjoy With a peaceful life. For a married woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating tomatoes, this symbolizes that she will face some problems in the coming period, but they will be solved, God willing. For a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating tomatoes, this indicates the ease of her birth and the birth of a healthy child. And free of any disease, God willing. For the man: If the man is single and eats tomatoes in his pajamas, this symbolizes an improvement in his financial situation in the near future. But if the man gets married and eats tomatoes in his dream, this means family stability and a change in his and his family’s circumstances for the better. Meaning of seeing tomatoes Rotten tomatoes in a dream: For an unmarried woman: Rotten tomatoes in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate that she will go through a period of serious illness in the coming period. For a married woman: Rotten tomatoes in a married woman’s dream symbolize a...
